title: 日本ダービーにむけて

text.jpText:
ついに『日本ダービー』が幕を開ける。
フジキセキは囲み取材にも堂々と応じ、
ユーモアを交えて意気込みを語った。
text.enText:
At last, the "Japan Derby" is about to begin. 
Fujikiseki was graciously interviewed and 
spoke with humor about her enthusiasm for the 
race. She spoke with humor and enthusiasm.

text.jpText:
観客たちの期待は高まり、あの後輩ウマ娘も
複雑な想いで見守っていた。
フジキセキは、すべてを背にレースへ赴く。
text.enText:
The crowd's anticipation was high, and even 
the junior horsegirl was looking on with 
mixed feelings. Fujikiseki, with everything 
on her shoulders, heads into the race.
